Uses of Package
player

Packages that use player
Package
Description
day
This package contains classes that define each day of the game - Battle.java, Day.java, and Shop.java
gui
This package contains the GameEnvironment, and all the GUI classes.
leaderboard
This package contains the class and text file associated with the local leaderboard.
player
This package contains information that is unique to the player - classes Inventory, Player, PlayerScore and Team.
purchasable
The Purchasable package contains all the classes that can be bought from the Stores.
purchasable.items
The Item package containing all the various item types and functionality.
purchasable.monsters
Monster package containing the different Monster classes.
random_event
Random Events package containing all the logic for running random events.
  • Classes in player used by day
    Class
    Description
    Player
    The player class, containing the player's inventory, username and score.
  • Classes in player used by gui
    Class
    Description
    Inventory
    The player's inventory of currently owned Monsters and Items
    Player
    The player class, containing the player's inventory, username and score.
    Team
    Class that implements the Team functionality for the Player and sorts the Team by their speed attribute
  • Classes in player used by leaderboard
    Class
    Description
    PlayerScore
    The PlayerScore class deals with storing the points scored by the player in a way that can be used by a leaderboard
  • Classes in player used by player
